title: Spain Dhol Procession Wasn’t Celebrating Ram Mandir Construction
subtitle: Fact Checking viral video of Indians celebrating construction of Ram Mandir in Spain  ahead of the Ayodhya Bhoomi Poojan | The video is from 2018 of the Pune based dhol-tasha group, Swarangdhar.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video showing a dhol performance by Indians in the streets of Spain has gone viral with a false claim that it shows celebrations ahead of the Bhoomi Pujan in Ayodhya.

However, the video is from 2018 when a Pune-based dhol-tasha group had gone to Spain for an International Folk Festival.
